title: Funeral prayers of Hassan Khel IBO offered at Peshawar Garrison
content:
RAWALPINDI, Jul 11 (APP): The funeral prayers of the martyrs of Hassan Khel intelligence-based operation (IBO) were offered at Peshawar Garrison Peshawar Garrison on Thursday.
Sepoy Badam Gul Shaheed (native District Kohat) and Sepoy Muhammad Idris Shaheed (resident District Swabi) had embraced martyrdom while bravely fighting against terrorists during the IBO, an Inter Services Public Relations (ISPR) news release said.
The Corps Commander Peshawar and a large number of civil and military officials participated in the funeral prayer.
The martyrs would be buried in their native areas with full military honours.
